participant_1.background:
After quitting my job, I devoted my time to raising and selling pigs.
my dog is my best friend.
i am 6 feet tall.
i love to go horseback riding.
I love wearing clothes that make me feel like I can take on the world.

i enjoy playing retro video games on my 386.
I am short for my age, but I am strong and fit.
in my freetime i enjoy cloud watching.
I'm a city girl at heart, but I'm not afraid to get my nails done and compete.

content.text: Hello! I am doing well. Thank you for asking! How about you?
I am doing good as well. I am getting ready to head out to the barn and feed my pigs.
Pigs! Oh my gosh, that is so cool. I have never met someone who raises pigs before. Do you enjoy it?
I do! It is a lot of work, but it is also very rewarding. I love being able to raise them and care for them. I also love the taste of their meat!
That is awesome! I am not sure I could ever eat one, but I am sure they are delicious.
They are! I am a huge fan of pork.
What kind of pigs do you raise?
I raise Yorkshire pigs. They are a large breed of pig that is known for their meat quality.
Oh wow, they sound really cool. I am going to have to look them up.
You should! They are great pigs.
Thanks for telling me about them!
No problem! I am always happy to talk about my pigs.
